output:
Sir, what if the writer is attempting to create a story where nothing much happens?
Where people don't change, they don't have any epiphanies, they struggle and are frustrated
and nothing is resolved?
More a reflection of the real world.
Are you out of your fucking mind?
Are you out of your fucking mind?
Are you out of your fucking mind?
Are you out of your fucking mind?
Are you out of your fucking mind?
You gotta go back.
Put in the drama.
I can't go back.
I've got pages of false starts and wrong approaches.
I'm way past my deadline.
I'll tell you a secret.
The last act makes the film.
Wow them in the end.
You've got a hit.
You can have flaws, problems, but wow them in the end.
